item.title: Bushdeer
item.description: Overview Bushdeer (Type Species spp. Floricervus Floricervus), native to the steppes of the 2nd and -1st realms, are a type of deer related to the Sika deer of Earth.

item.title: Freakleaf
item.description: Overview Freakleaf is the name given to a plant native to the 1st Realm. It is nonpoisonous and has yellow leaves which are fermented, dried, ground into a powder, and dissolved in water.

item.title: Ikplik
item.description: Overview The Ikplik is a mundozoan animal native to the 2nd Realm. Descended from meerkats, they retain their size, pack structure, and appearance despite their shift into the niche of herbivores native to grassland habitats.

item.title: Minikin
item.description: Overview Minikin (spp. Sciurus sapiens) are a small rodent species native to the 2nd Realm. They are arboreal omnivores which tend toward eating nuts and other plants, and descended from red squirrels from the 0th realm.
